description: Single storey rear infill extension; single storey side extension; replacement of existing single glazed timber framed window and door assembly to rear elevation with double glazed timber framed window and door assembly
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 2116-P/EX/01 (Location Plan & Existing Site, Ground & First Floor/Roof Plans & Front, Rear & Side Elevations), 2116-P/P/01 (Proposed Site, Ground Floor & First Floor/Roof Plans & Front, Rear & Side Elevations - Alternate Option), 2116-P/DL-D/01 (Cross Section Details of New External Door Assembly ED1 - Double Glazed), 2116-P/DL-W/01	(Cross Section Details of New Window Assemblies GW1 to GW5 - Double Glazed), 2116-P/W&ED-S/01 (Window & External Door Schedule) and Design and Access Statement dated 11 February 2022 (ref 2116).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
